plot: Johnnie is a struggling writer who cleans theatre restrooms at night to earn money. Johnnie's best friend, Dana, is a self-proclaimed movie producer turns out to be a two time embezzler. ...
title: Nice Guys...
plot_es: Johnnie is a struggling writer who cleans theatre restrooms at night to earn money. Johnnie's best friend, Dana, is a self-proclaimed movie producer turns out to be a two time embezzler. ...
